title: Emperor - Novel Updates
author: From Afar   来自远方
description: Being a teacher is a noble profession, and being a teacher is a high-risk profession. Especially when the student is a playful emperor, the accompany is the commander of Jinyiwei, the two factory owners in the east and west are the one who pours the tea, and there are three bachelors in the cabinet and six ministers who are watching in shifts. Always ready to roll up your sleeves to 'dress people', the pressure is really extraordinary. Standing on the podium of Wenhua Hall, Yang Zan>
